childnodes.sy: Ultimate Man Meal: Tasty rosemary barbecued bread topped with grilled steak and pickled goodies of your choosing. Inspired by Gerard Butler and his team of god like men from 300.
childnodes.t: 10. 300 The Movie | Bread on the BBQ

childnodes.sy: Delicious summer party dish: Shrimp bake filled with clams, kelbasa, corn, potatoes and of course shrimp. All inspired by one of my favourite movies: Forrest Gump.
Sweet and unassuming on the outside, dangerously spicy on the inside. This movie has inspired me to make some crazy bipolar wings! Try them out… I dare you! Recipe based in the movie Gone Girl.
childnodes.t: 8. Gone Girl | Spicy and Sweet Chicken wings

childnodes.sy: Inspired by Blue Valentine, I can promise that when your marriage fails you... these cakes will not. Deliciously rich a moist white chocolate cake with a bright blueberry reduction and creamy vanilla pudding.
childnodes.t: 7. Blue Valentine | Mini BlueBerry Vanilla Cakes

childnodes.sy: Quinoa Waffle Sandwich with cumin lime Chicken, for those days you need extra protein after your workout. Recipe inspired by the movie Rocky.
childnodes.t: 6. Rocky | Quinoa Waffle Sandwich with Cumin Lime Chicken

childnodes.sy: Recipe inspired by the movie 'The Birds'. Citrus Sage Roast Chicken with Chai Couscous.
childnodes.t: 5. The Birds | Citrus Sage Roast Chicken with Chai Couscous

childnodes.sy: Cute and crisp Ginger-bird-men recipe inspired by one of this year’s top movies -Birdman! An incredibly clever and moving film which has the added technique of appearing as though it’s all one shot.

Love BBQ chicken pizza? Love things that are twisted? Inspired by the blockbusting movie TWISTER! These bbq chicken twists are so good you won't care that there's a cow flying by... and that's saying something.
This is a foolproof homemade pasta recipe inspired by the one and only Godfather! Think earthy beet, garlic, fresh basil and tangy goat cheese. Delicious and so satisfying!

V for Vendetta inspires a special take on “Eggie in a basket”. Deliciously crisp crust with a creamy brie and perfectly cooked egg center. Tangy wild blueberries on the bottom and a little added sweetness of maple syrup drizzled over top.
childnodes.t: 1. V for Vendetta | Inspired Recipe for Eggie in a Basket
